html:
2.13.18  4:13 pm   can we really figure out what is in the box?

     i think so

2.13.18  3:54 pm   are comments/questions that simply say "i like your creations" valuable to you?

     oh hell yeah

2.13.18  3:42 pm   Did you succeed at working on shorter videos while at the same time working on a longer song+video on the side?

     almost

     If so, what can you tell us about the current son?

     it's good

     If not, are you gonna work on the next song soon?

     yes

2.13.18  3:41 pm   Purple or Blue?

     purple

2.13.18  3:35 pm   which end do you peel a banana from? my friends and i had an intense debate

     from the tab

2.13.18  3:33 pm   what is the darn thing though

     i assure you an investigation is under way

2.13.18  3:27 pm   jeepers, creepers, whered you get those peepers? 

     argos

2.13.18  3:23 pm   does it ever get lonely recording all the instrumental and voices by yourself?

     yes

2.13.18  2:58 pm   opinion on duct tape?

     sometimes you wanna just go in there and tape the hell outta some ducts

2.13.18  2:38 pm   what does the existence of bananas imply?

     *jeff foxworthy voice* you might be in the jungle

2.13.18  1:40 pm   I can't go back to where I come from, it's not fun there. What should I go now

     everywhere else

2.13.18  12:59 pm   whats your favorite "scraps" video? 

     there's one that comes to mind where he says [psycho voice] 'i dunno what you're talking about... i'm rich!!! ... i got it all!!!'

2.13.18  12:49 pm   you once said there were no songs in the phrygian mode.

     i don't think i quite said that

      what about the pyramid song by radiohead? 

     no, they are borrowing plenty of other notes outside of phrygian, such as the major 3rd of the key, and then later they hit a flat 7 major chord (E) which would be borrowing the natural 9th of the key. perhaps more cases as well, i didn't listen any further

2.13.18  12:41 pm   WHY DO I KEEP ACCIDENTALLY PUTTING PERIODS AT THE END OF MY QUESTIONS INSTEAD OF QUESTION MARKS HELP

     oh, but that sounds like fun

2.13.18  12:28 pm   Generally speaking, do you enjoy receiving silly questions more, or would you rater get the more serious questions? Do you like receiving the more philosophical ones, as well? 

     which one is which

2.13.18  12:26 pm   What's your opinion on photography?

     it's good

     Like, if you had the time, do you ever think you would enjoy taking it up?

     yes

      Or do you much prefer music or other forms of art?

2.13.18  12:07 pm   Is it late?

     yes, and early

2.13.18  10:40 am   would you use a capital letter when describing an element? (example: Ne, K, AU)

     absolutely

2.13.18  10:33 am   2.12.18  9:42 am after hearing ultralight beam and sunday candy i realized "hey gospel music can be straight fire."

     oh hell yea that's what i'm talking about

     fuck the haters. this isn't a question but i hope you like it anyway even if you very likely won't put it online

2.13.18  9:36 am   When do you think you might do more reality videos?

     2.1.18  10:19 am

2.13.18  8:16 am   i understand you're upset at people being upset all the time at everything. the swirling pool of cynicism seems to upend all the reasonable, peaceful celebfolk. that said, that's just people expressing themselves, man. when you invite everyone to the party you get some sad clowns being their sad selves. what's your game plan for continuing to Handle The Pressure without compromising your greater ideals?

     it seems to be going well. i've been at this for a few years now

2.13.18  8:11 am   Did you ever notice that A is the first letter of the alphabet?

     now that you mention it, i see what you mean

2.13.18  6:57 am   How do you be a person?

     so far you are doing great

2.13.18  6:24 am   Yo, I'm looking into going online whenever I get good enough to finish projects fast. So, do you beleive having my own website, kinda like yours, would be a good investment, or is it better to just work on getting it into as many popular platforms only? Has this website helped you in ways outside of the actual content posted? (E.G: Motivation or something)

     it's a good home base, and when i got it made, i was much much more comfortable than i was on anyone else's site, because i got to format everything exactly the way i wanted

2.13.18  6:17 am   are we friends?

     who is this

2.13.18  4:41 am   Do you need a cat?

     no

2.13.18  3:51 am   I'm too worried about stuff I don't know to start making things because I want it to be perfect first time. How can I solve this?

     never do anything

2.13.18  2:37 am   How do you build a house for a kangaroo?

     it helps to be a kangaroo

2.13.18  1:58 am   Where did we go wrong?

     all at slightly different places, i presume

2.12.18  11:41 pm   do you take criticism on your content?

     i already gave myself all the criticism. i don't think there would be any left to receive

2.12.18  10:22 pm   How do people karate chop cinder blocks in half using their bear hands only?

     hit it really hard, i guess?

2.12.18  9:51 pm   Can you make a song entirely about trains?

     i have one but it sounds like it's about roads

2.12.18  9:51 pm   Is the proof really in the pudding?

     some times

2.12.18  9:14 pm   do you think space travel should be one of our highest priorities as people?

     not necessarily

2.12.18  8:05 pm   What the heck is a rapscallion? 

     i don't know

2.12.18  6:44 pm   So what's your plan now? 

     i will tell you soon

2.12.18  6:36 pm   i'm batman

     oh hi

2.12.18  6:31 pm   do your videos have love hidden in them?

     yes

2.12.18  6:26 pm   I love your music, new canaan has been stuck in my head for about 4 weeks, what or who would you say is your inspiration for making such wonderful melodies?

     you liking it

2.12.18  4:10 pm   are you the next step

     for some people i might be

2.12.18  6:19 pm   What goes into your decision to use capital letters on the rare occasions you do. Do you use capital letters only when things are very important?

     sometimes to emphasize a word, i might capitalize the first letter. sometimes i use it to start a sentence when the previous sentence ends with etc. and it wouldn't otherwise be clear. i very often use capitals for acronyms. and music chords, or just when talking about things labeled with letters, such as column A and column B. i use capital letters in almost every common way, with the exception of mandatory capitalization of the first word in a sentence and the letter i

2.12.18  4:07 pm   2.12.18  1:58 pm I just went online and took a visual Turing test. I scored 40%. What does that mean? I'm not a person?

     they are raising the standards

2.12.18  4:03 pm   2.9.18  8:43 am how would you know that people would find the audio clips boring, if you never released them without visuals?

     it's kind of like knowing if you are gonna have enough water for the desert. there's not too much trial and error, you just have to bring as much as you can

2.12.18  3:21 pm   Do personal experiences feed into your music/content,

     sometimes

      or is most of it a result of a strong emotion/feeling? or neither lol

     some of it

2.12.18  3:17 pm   do you think you have felt every emotion?

     no

2.12.18  2:57 pm   were you always an optimist, or did you have to train yourself to see the good in any situation?

     i had a stunning realization at some point

2.12.18  2:31 pm   i've been more like Myself recently, and now i don't have any friends. it may be some time before i find someone like me, but what if that never happens?

     i think it will

      is it ok to be yourself and stop caring about what other people think,

     in some ways

      r is it possible to find a balance between being yourself and fitting in?

     it might be

2.12.18  2:04 pm   what color is the dress?

     it depends on the settings on your monitor

2.12.18  1:58 pm   Congratulations you passed Turing test

     oh hell yeah that's what i'm talking about

2.12.18  1:46 pm   How do you come up with half the stuff you make.

     which half

      Also us dang captial letters

     please notice when i do
